pageProps.title: Examples and stories are more memorable than explanations

children.value: We are more associative than structured
in my experience, legends and origin stories are often more memorable especially with the outlandish ones like the ancient Greek and Egyptian stories
at times, we are also more creative than logical but it does not mean that
Creativity and logic are not opposites
obviously, this doesn't mean explanations should be abandoned;
and explanations tend to be one of the first things we remember when going back to a topic
furthermore, those examples can serve as practical way to start learning on things;
Learning a new skill often starts from specific places
